documentation.text:
@title TokenEmitter - lightweight contract that emits Transfer and Ping events
 @notice Useful for generating both standard Transfer events and arbitrary Ping events for scanners
@notice Emitted when someone calls ping with a message
@notice Simple constructor mints initial balance to deployer
@notice Transfer tokens to `to` and emit Transfer event
@notice Emit Ping event with a message (no state change)

devdoc.title: TokenEmitter - lightweight contract that emits Transfer and Ping events

Ping(address,string).notice: Emitted when someone calls ping with a message

constructor.notice: Simple constructor mints initial balance to deployer

ping(string).notice: Emit Ping event with a message (no state change)

transfer(address,uint256).notice: Transfer tokens to `to` and emit Transfer event

userdoc.notice: Useful for generating both standard Transfer events and arbitrary Ping events for scanners
